title: DayNa Decker
seo_title: DayNa Decker | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Style visionary and trendsetting innovator DayNa Decker is the creator behind the hotel’s couture line of opulently scented candles, diffusers and bath amenities. Inspired by her travels as a global citizen and former Ford model, DayNa has translated her life experiences into a line of products that exudes a sense of luxury and decadent sophistication.
contents: Style visionary and trendsetting innovator DayNa Decker is the creator behind the hotel’s couture line of opulently scented candles, diffusers and bath amenities. Inspired by her travels as a global citizen and former Ford model, DayNa has translated her life experiences into a line of products that exudes a sense of luxury and decadent sophistication. All bedrooms and suites are appointed with DayNa Decker eco-chic Art Deco-inspired products, each reflecting the worldly lifestyle of today’s most discerning travelers. Sharing a love for luxury, WestHouse Hotel New York has partnered with the DayNa Decker brand to create a unique experience for our Resident guests.
